channel.title: Web on CharlyCst
channel.description: Recent content in Web on CharlyCst

item.title: Let's (re)code React
item.description: With more than 140k stars on Github at the time of writing, React is arguably one of the most used and loved web framework, but did you ever asked yourself how it works under the hood? Well you may know that there is this virtual DOM thing, and a certain reconciliation algorithm, but how do they work exactly? The best way to find out is probably to (re)code React by ourselves, let’s get started!
